wfe.title: incorporate the wave front error error

psf.title: simulate a physically realistic point spread function

rolling_shutter.title: incorporate the time-delay due to rolling shutter

CellPix.title: Number of cells corresponds to detector pixel size

PixNum.title: Number of detector pixels for the side length of a single area

dx.title: x difference between psf center and detector pixel center

dy.title: y difference between psf center and detector pixel center

dtace.title: Timestep of ACE simulation in sec.

tace.title: Time range of ACE simulation in sec (to be adjusted).

acex_std.title: standard deviation of ACE along with X-axis (arcsec).

acey_std.title: standard deviation of ACE along with Y-axis (arcsec).

Nplate.title: Number of plates which make up a small frame.
